footer.admission_text: Admissions are Open for the Next Year Batch
footer.description: Tuitional is an Online Ed-Tech Platform. We do live tutoring classes for Grades 4-8, IGCSE, GCSE, & A-Levels etc for all boards like Cambridge, Pearson Edexcel

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Tuitional Education
privacy.description: Privacy policy for Tuitional Education platform.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy for Tuitional Education
privacy.intro: Tuitional Education ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard the information you provide to us when you use our services. This document is specifically designed to comply with Google OAuth consent screen requirements.
privacy.personal_desc: When you use our platform, we may collect the following personal information:
privacy.name: Name
privacy.google_account: Google account information (accessed via Google OAuth, as authorized by you).
privacy.usage_desc: We collect analytics related to the scheduling and usage of class meeting links, including:
privacy.class_links: Class Meeting Links: We use Google Meet integration to automatically create class meeting links for teachers and students.
privacy.data_analytics: Data Analytics: Meeting analytics (such as attendance and duration) are stored in our database to provide insights and improve the learning experience.
privacy.communication: Communication: To send important updates, notifications, or reminders related to your classes.
privacy.sharing_desc: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following cases:
privacy.service_providers: Service Providers: Third-party tools and services (such as Google Meet) used to facilitate our operations.
privacy.legal_requirements: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to comply with legal processes.
privacy.security_desc: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including:
privacy.consent_desc: By using our services and authorizing Google OAuth, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.rights_desc: You have the following rights regarding your data:
privacy.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
privacy.correction: Correction: Request corrections to inaccuracies in your data.
privacy.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your data, subject to legal or operational requirements.
privacy.exercise_rights: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
privacy.third_party_desc: Our integration with Google Meet is subject to Google's privacy policy. We recommend reviewing Google's policies to understand how they handle your information.
privacy.changes_desc: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. You will be notified of changes through our platform or via email. Continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
privacy.contact_desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service - Tuitional Education
terms.heading: Terms of Service for Tuitional Education
terms.intro: Welcome to Tuitional Education ("we" or "our platform"). By using our services, you agree to comply with the following Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.
terms.use_services_desc: Our services, including integration with Google Meet for creating class meeting links, are intended for educational purposes only. You agree to use our platform responsibly and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.account_confidentiality: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and ensuring the security of your account.
terms.notify_unauthorized: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or security breach.
terms.prohibited_desc: When using our services, you agree not to:
terms.disrupt_platform: Engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with our platform's functionality.
terms.misuse_services: Misuse our services for unauthorized purposes, including but not limited to spamming, hacking, or distributing harmful content.
terms.infringe_ip: Infringe upon the intellectual property rights of others.
terms.ip_desc: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property associated with Tuitional Education are owned by Tuitional Education or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute our content without prior written consent.
terms.modifications_desc: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our services at any time without prior notice. We are not liable for any inconvenience or loss resulting from such changes.
terms.liability_desc: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Tuitional Education is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.
terms.termination_desc: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion if you violate these Terms or engage in activities harmful to our platform or users.
terms.governing_desc: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Insert Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Insert Jurisdiction].
terms.changes_desc: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through our platform or via email. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.contact_desc: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
